DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study was to compare commonly used videolaryngoscopes (C-MAC, McGrath, Intubrite) with the most commonly used Miller laryngoscope.
DOC.criteria: give voluntary consent to participate in the study more than 1 year of clinical experience >30 endotracheal intubation in the outofhospital emergency setting paramedics not meet the above criteria wrist or low back diseases pregnancy
